```{r setup}
library(picoinjector)
library(ggplot2)
```


Laplace pressure:
$$\Delta p = \frac{2\gamma}{R}$$

Assume water-oil interface with $\gamma = 35.26 \, \mathrm{mN/m}$:

```{r}
gamma <- 35.26e-3
```

Calculate Laplace pressure for curvature radii of 5-30 Âµm:

```{r}
tibble::tibble("radius" = seq(5, 30, 0.5) * 1e-6) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate("laplace_pressure" = (radius^-1)*2*gamma) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = radius*1e6, y = laplace_pressure)) + 
  geom_line() + 
  theme_pretty() + 
  labs(y = "Laplace pressure [Pa]",
       x = "Radius of curvature [um]")
```
